target.mrk: 移轉以集合為基礎的群組
以集合為基礎的群組移轉時的考量事項。

trans-unit.source: When migrating set-based groups, such as activity type groups, please note the following:

seg-source.mrk: When migrating set-based groups, such as activity type groups, please note the following:

target.mrk: 移轉以集合為基礎的群組時，例如作業類型群組，請注意下列事項：

trans-unit.source: Migration of groups can't be transported between systems. Therefore, the migration must be done separately in both quality and production systems.

seg-source.mrk: Migration of groups can't be transported between systems.
Therefore, the migration must be done separately in both quality and production systems.

target.mrk: 由於無法在系統之間傳輸群組的移轉，
因此必須在品質系統和正式運作系統中個別完成移轉動作。

trans-unit.source: For a 3-system landscape, the migration needs to be repeated in development, test, and production systems.

seg-source.mrk: For a 3-system landscape, the migration needs to be repeated in development, test, and production systems.

target.mrk: 針對 3 個系統架構，需在開發、測試和正式運作系統重複移轉動作。

trans-unit.source: During migration, the applications or configurations that use the groups (<emphasis>where-used list</emphasis>) are automatically updated to the new hierarchies. Note that some group usages are configurations, for example the activity type groups used in <uicontrol>Define Splitting Structures</uicontrol>, the changes to them need to be executed in quality system and transported to production system. To ensure consistency, SAP recommends you to migrate groups in all relevant systems and then release the transport requests for configurations.

seg-source.mrk: During migration, the applications or configurations that use the groups (<emphasis>where-used list</emphasis>) are automatically updated to the new hierarchies.

Note that some group usages are configurations, for example the activity type groups used in <uicontrol>Define Splitting Structures</uicontrol>, the changes to them need to be executed in quality system and transported to production system.
To ensure consistency, SAP recommends you to migrate groups in all relevant systems and then release the transport requests for configurations.

target.mrk: 移轉期間，使用群組 (<emphasis>使用清單</emphasis>) 的應用程式或組態會自動更新至新階層。
請注意部份用途為組態的群組 (例如用於 <uicontrol>[定義分割結構]</uicontrol> 的作業類型群組)，更改需在品質系統執行並傳輸至正式運作系統。
若要確保一致性，SAP 建議您在所有相關系統移轉群組並核發組態的傳輸請求。

trans-unit.source: Group ID can't exceed 15 characters. Please pay special attention to the <emphasis>groups with subnodes</emphasis>, because during the migration, a subgroup is automatically generated for each subnode. The subgroup ID is comprised of the new parent group ID, the special character "~", and subnode ID and tends to be long. Therefore, avoid specifying long IDs as new group IDs.

seg-source.mrk: Please pay special attention to the <emphasis>groups with subnodes</emphasis>, because during the migration, a subgroup is automatically generated for each subnode.
The subgroup ID is comprised of the new parent group ID, the special character "~", and subnode ID and tends to be long.
Therefore, avoid specifying long IDs as new group IDs.

target.mrk: 群組 ID 不可超過 15 個字元。
由於移轉期間每個子節點皆會自動產生子群組，請特別注意<emphasis>含子節點的群組</emphasis>。
子群組 ID 由新的上層群組 ID、特殊字元 "~" 以及子節點 ID 組成，ID 通常較長。
因此，請避免指定過長 ID 為新群組 ID。
